name: Darkness and Flame: The Dark Side f2p
description: There is no one in the world who could return from the Dark Side inviolate… “Darkness and Flame. The Dark Side” is an adventure game in the genre of Hidden Objects, with plenty of mini-games and puzzles, unforgettable characters and complicated quests.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 950 MB available space
